response.original_title: Memórias No Chumbo – O futebol nos tempos do Condor
response.overview: The documentary "Memórias do Chumbo – O Futebol nos Tempos do Condor", an investigation spanning 4 countries, exposed how the dictatorial governments that ruled South America from the 1960s to the 1980s infiltrated football and used it for their purposes.
response.title: Memórias No Chumbo – O futebol nos tempos do Condor
